body_html:
Thank you @shamoya ,

I didn't set any env variables, and just left them as default.

For my cluster environment:
Each machine has only one RDMA device with two ports, Mellanox connectx-3; For RDMA_GID_INDEX, this NIC doesn't support RoCEv2; For RDMA_TRAFFIC_CLASS, I think PCP in VLAN field is used for distinguishing different class in RoCEv1, and this env variable wasn't set, anyway.

body:
Thank you @shamoya ,

I didn't set any env variables, and just left them as default.

For my cluster environment:
Each machine has only one RDMA device with two ports, Mellanox connectx-3; For RDMA_GID_INDEX, this NIC doesn't support RoCEv2; For RDMA_TRAFFIC_CLASS, I think PCP in VLAN field is used for distinguishing different class in RoCEv1, and this env variable wasn't set, anyway.
